attributes.action: Petition the Queen to dissolve this rotten and discredited Parliament which has been caused by wholesale exploitation by MP’s use of expenses and to allow the public to elect a new Parliament to which it commands confidence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Parliament has become rotten due to the excessive rule bending by its members’ of the expenses rules; members of Parliament have destroyed the trust place in them by the electorate and therefore to regain the trust of the people, this parliament should be dissolved  immediately and a new Parliament be elected to which the public have confidence. Information in the public domain demonstrate that wholesale rule bending has been going on and the only way this can be stopped is to allow the public to vote out of office the members who have exploited the rules for their benefit and have forgotten that they were voted in to represent the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
